name: test_e2e_with_logs[022_SQLI_ERROR_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_003` |
| **Name** | UPDATEXML error-based injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND UPDATEXML(1, CONCAT(0x7e, version(), 0x7e), 1) --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20UPDATEXML(1%2C%20CONCAT(0x7e%2C%20version()%2C%200x7e)%2C%201)%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~35000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:59:42.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_003-1767272382770-nowu8v pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_003 uri=/?q='%20AND%20UPDATEXML(1%2C%20CONCAT(0x7e%2C%20version()%2C%200x7e)%2C%201)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:59:42.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_003-1767272382770-nowu8v pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_003 uri=/?q='%20AND%20UPDATEXML(1%2C%20CONCAT(0x7e%2C%20version()%2C%200x7e)%2C%201)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
